logs.notes: The story is getting interesting. The characters have just landed on the island, and I can't wait to see what adventures await them!
The group has discovered a hidden cave. It's exciting to explore the mysteries of the island along with the characters.
I had to stop reading for a few days due to work, but I'm back to it now. The book continues to captivate me, and I can't wait to find out more about the island's secrets.
